content: On the other side of the crack, you’ll enter a large tomb with a chest by a mural. It holds the Loong Scale - a very important object that allows you to access several secret bosses!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Sandgate Village Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley of Despair' and the sub-subsection 'The Loong’s Secret Tomb'.
The content is as follows:
On the other side of the crack, you’ll enter a large tomb with a chest by a mural. It holds the Loong Scale - a very important object that allows you to access several secret bosses!
